thread.title: Rent a 1-Bedroom in East Harlem for $985 a Month
thread.title_full: Rent a 1-Bedroom in East Harlem for $985 a Month

title: Rent a 1-Bedroom in East Harlem for $985 a Month
text:
Kassin Sabbagh Realty 
EAST HARLEM — Applications for one-bedroom apartments that will rent in East Harlem for $985 will open Wednesday. 
The lottery will put up five units in a newly constructed eight-story building at 2138 Third Avenue. 
They are eligible to singles earning between $33,772 and $38,100, or two-person households earning between $33,772 and $43,500. 
There are 21 units in the building, which also includes an elevator and a laundry room. 
Applications are due March 2. 
► READ MORE: How to Apply for Affordable Housing in New York City 
Preference for half of the units will go to current residents of Manhattan's Community Board 11. 
Those interested can apply online at nyc.gov/housingconnect or by mail by sending a self-addressed envelope to Raveh Realty LLC, 55 Northern Blvd. Suite 210, Great Neck, NY 11021.
